item.title: Duplicating this code?
item.dc:creator: @Delta2 Delta_
item.description:
@Delta2 wrote:

This has nothing do with clients.
Anyways, in the code

if (wearID == 1050) { npcId = 1552; isNpc = true; updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
You will see a bracket

if (wearID == 1050) { npcId = 1552; isNpc = true; updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; }
Under the bracket add

if (wearID == ITEMID) { npcId = NPCID; isNpc = true; updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; }
Replace the ITEMID and NPCID with the correct information.

Read full topic

How can i make a double for this but for dif npc and items? I’ve tried heaps but it wont work…

[code] }

public boolean wear(int wearID, int slot) {
    int targetSlot = 0;

    if ((playerItems[slot] - 1) == wearID) {
        if (wearID == 1050) {
            npcId = 1552;
            isNpc = true;
            updateRequired = true;
            appearanceUpdateRequired = true;[/code]
